name: Orange Juice Syndrome
description:
You are an investigator finding out clues as to where a missing patient may be. 

Or are you?

You are finding clues on a woman who took they life of her child...

Or did she?

Can you figure out the link between this woman's identity and the main protagonist? I CHALLENGE THEE!!

I'm curious as to see the answers in the comment below. 

To give a little background, this patient, aged 43, was a famous physicist diagnosed with Cotard's syndrome- a debilitating neurological disorder in which one thinks they are dead, or parts of them are dead- this can spread to the foetus of a child a mother is carrying. 

the file: http://www.mediafire.com/file/n2x81ksu7j2rv4e/Orange_Juice.rar/file

This was a game made in ten days so excuse if it is buggy, I shall be updating fixes within the November month.
